00069             {

00071                   {

00074                         $this->PermitAlgorithms = get_package( 'permit::permit_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00075                         $this->Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00076                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00077                         $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00078                   }
00079                   catch( Exception $e )
00080                   {

00115             function                process_permit( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00116             {
00117                   try
00118                   {
00119                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit' ) ; )
00120                         {
00121                               if( in_array( $MacroParameters , $this->Permits ) )
00122                               {
00123                                     $Str = $this->String->show_block( 
00124                                           $Str , 'permit:'.$MacroParameters , 'permit:~'.$MacroParameters , $Changed
00125                                     );
00126                               }
00127                               else
00128                               {
00129                                     $Str = $this->String->hide_block( 
00130                                           $Str , 'permit:'.$MacroParameters , 'permit:~'.$MacroParameters , $Changed
00131                                     );
00132                               }
00133                               
00134                               $Changed = true;
00135                         }
00136                         
00137                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00138                   }
00139                   catch( Exception $e )
00140                   {
00141                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00142                   }
00143             }

00235             function                process_permit_list( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00236             {
00237                   try
00238                   {
00239                         /* printing list of all available permits */
00240                         if( strpos( $Str , '{permit_list}' ) !== false )
00241                         {
00242                               $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00243                               $Items = $this->Database->select( 'permit' , 'umx_permit' , '1 = 1' );
00244                               $c = count( $Items );
00245                               $AllPermits = '';
00246                               foreach( $Items as $k => $i )
00247                               {
00248                                     $AllPermits .= $i->permit;
00249                                     if( $k + 1 != $c )
00250                                     {
00251                                           $AllPermits .= ', ';
00252                                     }
00253                               }
00254                               $Str = str_replace( '{permit_list}' , $AllPermits , $Str );
00255                         }
00256                         
00257                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00258                   }
00259                   catch( Exception $e )
00260                   {
00261                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00262                   }
00263             }

00295             function                process_permit_list_for_object( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00296             {
00297                   try
00298                   {
00299                         $Rules = array( 'object' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00300                         
00301                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit_list_for_object' , $Rules ) ; )
00302                         {
00303                               $PermitList = '';
00304                               
00305                               if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
00306                               {
00307                                     $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00308                                     
00309                                     list( $Object , $Type ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'object,type' , 'public,' );
00310                                     $PermitList = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_permits_for_object( $Object , $Type , false );
00311                                     sort( $PermitList );
00312                                     $PermitList = implode( ', ' , $PermitList );
00313                               }
00314 
00315                               $Str = str_replace( "{permit_list_for_object:$Parameters}" , $PermitList , $Str );
00316                               $Changed = true;
00317                         }
00318                         
00319                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00320                   }
00321                   catch( Exception $e )
00322                   {
00323                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00324                   }
00325             }

00357             function                process_permit_list_widget( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00358             {
00359                   try
00360                   {
00361                         $Rules = array( 'all' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'object_permits' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00362                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit_list_widget' , $Rules ) ; )
00363                         {
00364                               if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
00365                               {
00366                                     $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00367                                     $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00368                                     
00369                                     $AllPermitList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'all' , 'public' );
00370                                     if( strlen( $AllPermitList ) == 0 )
00371                                     {
00372                                           $AllPermitList = array();
00373                                     }
00374                                     else
00375                                     {
00376                                           $AllPermitList = explode( ', ' , $AllPermitList );
00377                                     }
00378                                     
00379                                     $ObjectPermitList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object_permits' , 'public' );
00380                                     if( strlen( $ObjectPermitList ) == 0 )
00381                                     {
00382                                           $ObjectPermitList = array();
00383                                     }
00384                                     else
00385                                     {
00386                                           $ObjectPermitList = explode( ', ' , $ObjectPermitList );
00387                                     }
00388                                     
00389                                     $PermitListWidget = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'permit_list.tpl' );
00390                                     $PermitListWidget = str_replace( 
00391                                           '{object}' , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object' ) , $PermitListWidget
00392                                     );
00393                                     
00394                                     sort( $ObjectPermitList );
00395                                     foreach( $ObjectPermitList as $key => $p )
00396                                     {
00397                                           $PermitListWidget = str_replace( 
00398                                                 '{object_permits}' , 
00399                                                 "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='".$p.
00400                                                       "_div_id'><input type='hidden' id='".$p."_field_id' name='permits[]' value='$p'>".
00401                                                       "<a href=\"javascript:DeletePermit( '$p' );\">$p</a><br></div>{object_permits}" , 
00402                                                       $PermitListWidget
00403                                           );
00404                                     }
00405                                     
00406                                     sort( $AllPermitList );
00407                                     foreach( $AllPermitList as $key => $p )
00408                                     {
00409                                           if( in_array( $p , $ObjectPermitList ) === false )
00410                                           {
00411                                                 $PermitListWidget = str_replace( 
00412                                                       '{rest_permits}' , 
00413                                                       "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='".$p.
00414                                                             "_div_id_rest'><a href=\"javascript:AddPermit( '$p' );\">$p</a><br>".
00415                                                             "</div>{rest_permits}" , 
00416                                                       $PermitListWidget
00417                                                 );
00418                                           }
00419                                     }
00420                               }
00421                               else
00422                               {
00423                                     $PermitListWidget = '';
00424                               }
00425                               
00426                               $Str = str_replace( 
00427                                     "{permit_list_widget:$Parameters}" , $PermitListWidget , $Str
00428                               );
00429 
00430                               $Changed = true;
00431                         }
00432                         
00433                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00434                   }
00435                   catch( Exception $e )
00436                   {
00437                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00438                   }
00439             }

00459             function                get_controller()
00460             {
00461                   try
00462                   {
00463                         $Code = '';
00464                         
00465                         if( $this->ControllerWasAdded === false )
00466                         {
00467                               $Code = '{direct_controller:set_permit=1;delete_permit=1;toggle_permit=1'.
00468                                           'package_name=permit::permit_controller}';
00469                                           
00470                               $this->ControllerWasAdded = true;
00471                         }
00472                         
00473                         return( $Code );
00474                   }
00475                   catch( Exception $e )
00476                   {
00477                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00478                   }
00479             }

00511             function                process_set_permit_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00512             {
00513                   try
00514                   {
00515                         $Rules = array( 
00516                               'permit' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE
00517                         );
00518                         
00519                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'set_permit_button' , $Rules ) ; )
00520                         {
00521                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00522                               
00523                               list( $Text , $Group , $MasterId ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'text,group,master_id' );
00524                               $MasterType = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'user' );
00525                               $CheckBoxes = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'checkboxes' , 'user' );
00526                               
00527                               $Code = $this->get_controller();
00528                               $Code .= "{href:text=$Text;page=javascript:ultimix.permit.SetPermitButton( ".
00529                                     "'$Permit' , $MasterId , '$MasterType' , '$CheckBoxes' )}";
00530                               
00531                               $Str = str_replace( "{set_permit_button:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00532                               $Changed = true;
00533                         }
00534                         
00535                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00536                   }
00537                   catch( Exception $e )
00538                   {
00539                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00540                   }
00541             }

00697             function                process_permit_select( $Options , $Str , $Changed )
00698             {
00699                   try
00700                   {
00701                         $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00702                         
00703                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit_select' , $Rules ) ; )
00704                         {
00705                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00706                               
00707                               list( $Name , $Class ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'name,class',  'permit,flat width_160' );
00708                                                             
00709                               $Code = "{select:name=$Name;class=$Class;".
00710                                           "query=SELECT id , title AS value FROM `umx_permit` ORDER BY title}";
00711                               
00712                               $Str = str_replace( "{permit_select:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00713                               $Changed = true;
00714                         }
00715                         
00716                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00717                   }
00718                   catch( Exception $e )
00719                   {
00720                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00721                   }

00754             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00755             {
00756                   try
00757                   {
00758                         if( $this->Permits === false )
00759                         {
00760                               $this->Permits = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_permits_for_object( false , 'user' );
00761                         }
00762                         
00763                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00764                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_no_permit( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00765                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit_list( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00766                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit_list_for_object( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00767                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit_list_widget( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00768                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_set_permit_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00769                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_delete_permit_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00770                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_toggle_permit_button( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00771                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit_select( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
00772                         
00773                         return( $Str );
00774                   }
00775                   catch( Exception $e )
00776                   {
00777                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00778                   }
00779             }
00780       }
